title: Create Project Health Dashboard
description: Design and implement a dashboard showing project health metrics: task momentum, confidence levels, assumption validation status, risk indicators, and pattern insights. Include ASCII visualizations for terminal display.
completion_notes: Created comprehensive project health dashboard with ASCII visualizations. Implemented dashboard file at .claude/dashboard/project-health.md with sections for momentum phases, confidence metrics, assumption validation, risk indicators, pattern insights, task status, and overall health score. Also created show-dashboard.md command with detailed implementation instructions for real-time metric calculation and display.
